title.narrative: CROSS-SECTORAL APPROACHES

description.narrative: New Element, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development (Covid), Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Sri Lanka Country Programme is effectively and efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: New Element

description.narrative: In 2020, Sri Lanka Country Office continued to strengthen its cross-sectoral coordination mechanism to ensure that programmes are delivered in an effective and efficient manner by mainstreaming disaster risk reduction, climate change adaptation and C4D approaches. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:25/08/2020
